short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool allows you to effortlessly switch between popular search engines with just a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
“Switch My Search” Extension provides easy switch between different Search Engine based on the selection.  
By installing this extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement (https://switchmysearch.com/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://switchmysearch.com/privacy.html)

Search powered by Yahoo Search
